title: Man Riots ignoring strength is nuts
body:
Got a little bored not to long ago and started to try and read over a few topics. And yes call me what you will for looking it up but I looked up things along the phrase "Riot doesn't care" Mostly because I hear this phrase more than most others about Riot. And I'm not gonna set here and tell you the same thing that many many others have told before. What I will tell you is just a fun bit of fun information I found underneath all of this. Does anyone notice when people point out the fact that riot doesn't care such as well this  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ua4yuzq9-riot-truly-doesnt-care-huh?show=flat&page=2
that riot never seems to ever deny any of it?

replies.body:
hey guys, nobody comment on this
...
dammit

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ITW2ELhf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-02T01:53:19.025+0000)
>
> hey guys, nobody comment on this
> ...
> dammit

Why? I would enjoy if it if you at least gave a reason.
Yeah those reds don't take time to argue with my whining. They don't care about us! It's all about the money!
